title: Sets liberal construction provisions regarding nominating/ designating candidates to avoid disqualifications consistent with substantial law compliance
summary: Establishes standard of substantial compliance with election law provisions relating to nomination and designation of candidates for public office; so as to avoid the disqualification of candidates to the maximum extent feasible where there is no fraud.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring that provisions governing the nomination and designation of candidates be liberally construed to avoid the disqualification of candidates not inconsistent with substantial compliance therewith and the prevention of fraud
